trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Pell City
There were no other sightings in Pell City on or around March 25th 2002
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my bed about to fall asleep when a plane passed then a sec later a bluedisc like object,which i tought was another airplane,came into view heading inthe other direction and then stopped at about half of my window then hhoveredand stuff with pulsating lights. The object remained after another plane passedby then it just vanished in thin air.
